info.description: This is the public Twilio REST API.
info.title: Twilio REST API

get.description: Retrieve a list of all Services.

parameters.description: A unique, addressable name of this Service.
parameters.name: UniqueName

parameters.description: A human-readable description of this Service.
parameters.name: FriendlyName

parameters.description: Whether to inject Account credentials into a Function invocation context.
parameters.name: IncludeCredentials

/v1/Services/{ServiceSid}/Assets.description: A wrapper that represents a static file.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all Assets.

parameters.description: A human-readable description of this Asset.
parameters.name: FriendlyName

get.description: Retrieve a list of all Asset Versions.

parameters.description: The URL-friendly string by which this Asset Version can be referenced.
parameters.name: Path

parameters.description: The access control which determines how the Asset Version can be accessed.
parameters.name: Visibility

/v1/Services/{ServiceSid}/Assets/{Sid}.description: A wrapper that represents a static file.

parameters.description: A human-readable description of this Asset.
parameters.name: FriendlyName

/v1/Services/{ServiceSid}/Builds.description: A collection of Function Versions, Asset Versions, and Dependencies that form a deployable unit.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all Builds.

post.description: Create a new Build. At least one Function Version or Asset Version is required.

/v1/Services/{ServiceSid}/Builds/{Sid}.description: A collection of Function Versions, Asset Versions, and Dependencies that form a deployable unit.

/v1/Services/{ServiceSid}/Environments.description: Represents a deployed Build of a given set of Functions and/or Assets at a specific URL.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all Environments.

parameters.description: A unique, addressable name of this Environment.
parameters.name: UniqueName

parameters.description: A URL-friendly name that represents this Environment.
parameters.name: DomainSuffix

/v1/Services/{ServiceSid}/Environments/{.description: An association of a Build with an Environment.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all Deployments.

/v1/Services/{ServiceSid}/Environments/{.description: An association of a Build with an Environment.
A key and value pair that is specific to an Environment.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all Variables.

parameters.description: A string by which this Variable can be referenced.
parameters.name: Key

parameters.description: A string that contains the actual value of this Variable.
parameters.name: Value

/v1/Services/{ServiceSid}/Environments/{.description: A key and value pair that is specific to an Environment.

parameters.description: A string by which this Variable can be referenced.
parameters.name: Key

parameters.description: A string that contains the actual value of this Variable.
parameters.name: Value

/v1/Services/{ServiceSid}/Environments/{.description: Represents a deployed Build of a given set of Functions and/or Assets at a specific URL.

/v1/Services/{ServiceSid}/Functions.description: A wrapper that represents a Serverless JavaScript function.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all Functions.

parameters.description: A human-readable description of this Function.
parameters.name: FriendlyName

get.description: Retrieve a list of all Function Versions.

parameters.description: The URL-friendly string by which this Function Version can be referenced.
parameters.name: Path

parameters.description: The access control which determines how the Function Version can be accessed.
parameters.name: Visibility

/v1/Services/{ServiceSid}/Functions/{Sid.description: A wrapper that represents a Serverless JavaScript function.

parameters.description: A human-readable description of this Function.
parameters.name: FriendlyName

parameters.description: Serverless Service Sid or unique name.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: Whether to inject Account credentials into a Function invocation context.
parameters.name: IncludeCredentials

parameters.description: A human-readable description of this Service.
parameters.name: FriendlyName

tags.description: PLEASE NOTE that this is a Preview product that is subject to change. Use it with caution. If you currently do not have developer preview access, please contact help@twilio.com.
tags.name: Preview
